items.product-description: Weighing only 8.5kg, the Ergo Lite (KM-2501) is Karma’s lightest attendant-propelled wheelchair. The compact design is ideal for wheelchair users who need a simple, lightweight wheelchair for short trips. It is equipped with Karma’s unique S-Ergo seating system.

items.product-name: Walker Invalid’s Heavy Duty – All Pods
items.product-description: Walkers are most helpful for ambulating old age, weak or patients recovering from injury or illness. Ideal for users with limited strength or requiring maximum stabilization.

product-specs.title: TPE Pods
product-specs.description: High wear resistance and highly resilient

items.product-description:
Tynor Walking Stick is a general purpose walking aid, which can be used by geriatric, weak patients, or can be used as post-operative rehabilitation aid. Height adjustment feature ensures proper load bearing, comfort and correct posture. Available in silver, black and golden color. 

Comfortable hand grip. 
Strong and durable. 
Aesthetically pleasing. 
Easy height adjustment. 
Anti-slip pods

product-specs.title: Handle
product-specs.description: Extremely comfortable, ensures strong grip with uniform load bearing. Safety Lanyard allows free use of hand.

product-specs.title: TPE Pod
product-specs.description: Excellent traction, high wear resistance and high resilience.
